name: Splashed Yacht
description:
Gameplay

A game about a person riding a yacht, and they we're about to go to another city located in different island. Also, there is whales floating in the surface of the sea water. So they have to avoid whales so that their yacht will not collide with the whales. To avoid whales, they have to play a horn sounds, this will make a whale go away.

Control

W - move

R - brake

x - Horn

mouse - light

More Information

Oh yeah, btw, this is a abandoned game. And, one day, it backs.

Update Changelog
